ai.summary: A short, easy 3.5 km hike on Leitir Easaidh Path in the UK, suitable for beginners and families seeking a gentle walk with potential scenic views.
ai.terrain_summary: Mainly a well-defined grassy track with gentle rises and descents. Expect occasional uneven, rocky, or damp sections, especially after rain. Suitable footwear and a light layer are recommended.
ai.safety_notes: Check the weather forecast before setting out; UK conditions can change quickly. Stay on marked paths; bring enough water and a means of navigation. Carry a basic first aid kit, a map or GPS, and inform someone of your plans. If visibility drops or you feel unsure, turn back.
recommended_gear: Sturdy walking shoes or light hiking boots
Layered clothing with a waterproof/windproof jacket
Sun protection (sunscreen, hat) for sunny days
Phone with emergency contacts and a backup power bank
ai.best_seasons: Late spring to early autumn (roughly April to October) when daylight and weather conditions tend to be more favorable; can be hiked in other seasons with appropriate gear.

seo.title: Leitir Easaidh Path - Easy 3.5 km Hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: Explore Leitir Easaidh Path, an easy 3.5 km hike in the UK. Learn about terrain, safety tips, best seasons, and gear for a comfortable short walk.
